items.title: Eight Winners Selected for the TRB Airport Cooperative Research Program Graduate Research Awards
items.source: National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine
items.excerpt: Congratulations Johann Cardenas! His research project titled 'Mechanistic Overload Permitting Approach for Flexible Airfield Pavements via Deterministic Damage Factors' makes him an ACRP Graduate Research Award winner.

items.title: ICT, FAA harness AI to take airport pavements to new heights
items.excerpt: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering researchers visited the Federal Aviation Administration's William J. Hughes Technical Center in Atlantic City, New Jersey.
